text: firaun kee qaum ke saradaar kahane lage, "kya tum moosa aur usakee qaum ko aise hee chhod doge ki ve zameen mein bigaad paida karen aur ve tumhen aur tumhaare upaasyon ko chhod baithe?" usane kaha, "ham unake beton ko buree tarah qatl karenge aur unakee striyon ko jeevit rakhenge. nishchay hee hamen unapar poorn adhikaar praapt hai.
